snippet: David Lang’s vocal work “love fail” is being performed by Anonymous 4, a female vocal quartet, at the Harvey Theater at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews composer David Lang's vocal work love fail, performed by female vocal quartet Anonymous 4, at Brooklyn Academy of Music.
lead_paragraph: David Lang’s vocal work “love fail” is being performed by Anonymous 4, a female vocal quartet, at the Harvey Theater at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.

headline.seo: David Lang’s ‘love fail,’ performed by Anonymous 4
